interfaces

Interface PlaygroundInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Playground

    public interface PlaygroundInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      void amDone()
      Operation amDone The contestants inform the referee that they're done pulling the rope

    • Method Detail

      • startTrial

        void startTrial()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation startTrial Called by the referee to notify contestants and general repository of the beginning of the trial. Update rope position on the general repository and reset position in the playground.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      • wait_for_trial_conclusion

        ReturnInt wait_for_trial_conclusion()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation wait_for_trial_conclusion The referee waits while contestants pull the rope.
        Returns:
        ReturnInt int and state
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      • assertTrialDecision

        int assertTrialDecision()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Operation assertTrialDecision The referee notifies the contestants and coaches of the end of the trial. Update rope position based on the strength of the teams.
        Returns:
        rope position
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

      • declareGameWinner

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Returns:
        rope position
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
